#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int size,a[100][100],sum_row[100],sum_col[100];
        cin>>size;
        for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
            {
                sum_row[i]=0;
                for(int j=0;j<size;j++)
                    {
                        cin>>a[i][j];
                        sum_row[i]+=a[i][j];
                    }
            }

            for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
            {
                sum_col[i]=0;
                for(int j=0;j<size;j++)
                    {
                        sum_col[i]+=a[j][i];
                    }
            }


            int count_row=0,count_col=0,dummy_col=0,dummy_row=0;
            for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
            {

                if((sum_row[i]%2)==1)
                {
                    count_row++;
                    dummy_row=i+1;

                }
            }

            for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
            {
                if(sum_col[i]%2==1)
                {
                    count_col++;
                    dummy_col=i+1;
                }
            }
            if(count_row==0 && count_col==0)
            cout<<1<<endl;
            else if(count_row==1 && count_col==1)
            cout<<"("<<dummy_row<<","<<dummy_col<<")"<<endl;
            else
            cout<<0<<endl;


    }

    return 0;
}
